entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -21.8°C
Wind: W 34 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
